company.name: Cosmic Solar
company.description: Cosmic Solar is a leading provider of solar energy solutions for homes, businesses, and communities across India. With over 10 years of experience and 5000+ successful installations, we are committed to helping our customers reduce their electricity bills while contributing to a greener planet.

benefits: Save up to 90% on electricity bills

benefits: Reduce operating costs by up to 70%

whyChooseUs.title: Quality Assurance
whyChooseUs.description: We use only Tier-1 solar panels and inverters with international certifications and rigorous quality testing.

whyChooseUs.title: Expert Installation
whyChooseUs.description: Our team of certified engineers ensures professional installation with strict safety standards and minimal disruption.

whyChooseUs.title: Comprehensive Warranty
whyChooseUs.description: 25-year performance warranty on solar panels, 10-year warranty on inverters, and 5-year warranty on installation workmanship.

whyChooseUs.title: After-Sales Support
whyChooseUs.description: Dedicated customer support team, regular maintenance services, and quick resolution of any issues within 48 hours.

whyChooseUs.title: Financing Options
whyChooseUs.description: Flexible payment plans, 0% EMI options, and assistance with subsidy applications and net metering paperwork.

residential.eligibility: All residential customers with connected load up to 10kW
residential.process: Our team handles the entire subsidy application process on your behalf, from documentation to disbursement.
